content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM obtains most of your Personal Data through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. In addition, EPAM may obtain Personal Data about you from other sources, to the extent permitted by applicable law. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
